Interface ReplicatedEntityContext

  • All Superinterfaces:

    All Known Subinterfaces:

    public interface ReplicatedEntityContext
extends EntityContext
    Root context for all Replicated Entity contexts.

    • Method Detail

      • state

        <T extends ReplicatedData> java.util.Optional<T> state​(Class<T> dataClass)
                                                throws IllegalStateException
        The current Replicated Data object, if it's been created.
        Parameters:
        dataClass - The type of the Replicated Data that is expected.
        Returns:
        The current Replicated Data, or empty if none has been created yet.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current Replicated Data does not match the passed in dataClass type.
